item.name: ES-SIT event group by histogram Copy

formdata.value:
select * from t_redpacket_message_info;
select * from t_intel_alert_metric;

select * from t_redpacket_message_info;
select * from t_intel_alert_metric;

update t_alert_model_deploy set update_time=now() where model_id = 2019110101;
update t_alert_model_deploy set deploy_time = now();

SELECT
	a.ename,
	a. NAME,
	b.id,
	b.cname
FROM
	t_intel_alert_monitor_obj a
INNER JOIN t_intel_alert_metric b ON a.id = b.monitor_obj_id
ORDER BY
	a.id,
	b.id

body.raw: select * from alert.alert_trace_join_bak_all where interceptTime>='2021-01-19 09:30:00' and interceptTime<'2021-01-19 09:30:15' format Values
